fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, choose to initiate a Blackout tonight. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the night, the town will be notified there is a Blackout. All members of the good faction will only be able to visit people within 2 radius of them. (If the player order was TLHP, Viri, Rasen, Me, Wolfi. Zage, Vik, i would not be able to visit tlhp, vik, or anyone beyond them, but i can visit viri, rasen, wolfi, and zage)
- Your ability does not affect non-good roles.
